mapper.insert: insert into member(mNo, mId, pw, mName, phone, address, email, regDate) values(mNo_seq.nextval, #{mId}, #{pw}, #{mName}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{email}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where mId=#{mId}
select count(*) from member where email=#{email}
mapper.update: update member set pw=#{pw} where mId=#{mId}
mapper.select: select m.mNo, m.mId, m.mName, m.email, m.regDate, p.currentPoint from member m, point p order by mNo desc
